author: busyguy1
title: The Cardano Classroom
description: Early education sorely lacks curriculum on financial independence, even less so on blockchain, increasing the wealth gap.
solution: Cardano Classroom is an fun, interactive way for classrooms and individuals to earn a career in decentralized finance with a jobs program.
experience: I continue to teach my own children Cardano, and have surrounded myself with blockchain and educational experts who support this initiative.
